roles.name: Admin
roles.description: For users: use it to provide read and write access to all the resources

roles.name: Analyst
roles.description: For users: use it to give read-only access to all the resources

roles.name: Continuous Integration
roles.description: For automation: it includes the permissions required to enforce deployment policies

roles.name: None
roles.description: For users: use it to provide no read and write access to any resource

roles.name: Scope Manager
roles.description: For users: use it to create and modify scopes for the purpose of access control or vulnerability reporting

roles.name: Sensor Creator
roles.description: For automation: it consists of the permissions to create Sensors in secured clusters

roles.name: Vulnerability Management Approver
roles.description: For users: use it to provide access to approve vulnerability deferrals or false positive requests

roles.name: Vulnerability Management Requester
roles.description: For users: use it to provide access to request vulnerability deferrals or false positives

roles.name: Vulnerability Report Creator
roles.description: For users: use it to create and manage vulnerability reporting configurations for scheduled vulnerability reports
